function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of consensus on trust in nphi effectiveness","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of nphis is challenging to evaluate due to different measures and study types used","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Single studies conducted in specific communities may not provide conclusive evidence of nphi effectiveness","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of bias in comparing outcomes of communities with and without nphis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inclusion of studies using mathematical modelling for simulations and predictions may present a risk of bias in the review","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of studies targeting specific populations may lead to a limited understanding of the effects of nphis on those populations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to receive additional information from corresponding authors may result in incomplete data for the meta-analysis","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Collaborative data extraction involving multiple investigators may lead to variations in data interpretation and extraction.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disagreements during the screening and review process may lead to delays in study completion and potential bias in study inclusion.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Assessment of study methodology using subjective tools may introduce bias and affect the validity of the findings.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conducting meta-analyses without proper consideration of study quality and bias may lead to inaccurate conclusions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of publication bias may lead to overestimation or underestimation of treatment effects.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Converting outcome measures to daily basis using inaccurate formulas or methods may result in flawed data analysis.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate data for estimating the effect size","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Majority of studies from a limited number of countries us and china","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Observational quasi-experimental study designs","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in covid-19 indicators during and after lockdown","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Slight effects of lockdown on decreasing case growth rate","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effectiveness in reducing daily incidence rates and death trends","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective decrease in mortality growth rate after lockdown","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of individual social distancing measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Heterogeneity and publication bias in meta-analysis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possible publication bias in the study","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High heterogeneity among studies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Missed cases in the trim-and-fill test","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Late adoption of nphis leading to icu saturation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in measuring unique impact of specific nphis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic impact of early nphis such as lockdown","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Demographic characteristics and population densities impacting the effectiveness of nphis in controlling covid-19 spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited number of studies considering demographic and geographic factors in analyzing the effectiveness of nphis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of the role of health data infrastructures in evaluating nphi effectiveness in pandemics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Under-reporting of data due to mass panic in low-resource countries","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliability and validity of publicly available data from countries with poor data infrastructure","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Observational nature of included studies and lack of clinical trials due to the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Not all studies have used a complete number of possible covariates in the analysis, potentially leading to limited findings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confounding effect of covid-19 diagnosis testing considerations on outcomes.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty of a country’s actual total number of infected individuals due to dependence on testing strategies and number of tests performed.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dismissal of contextual factors and merging of intervention results from different countries in the meta-analysis.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative impact of harsh restrictions on the economy and people’s lives","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Problems with universal access to vaccines and their effectiveness","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of evaluation of nphis effectiveness in different countries","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fomite transmission of human pathogenic viruses on surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Recontamination of surfaces after disinfection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Efficacy of technology against specific viruses, such as coronavirus","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Propagation of human coronavirus 229e in human lung fibroblast mrc-5 cell line","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Storage of hcov 229e stocks at -80°c","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Enumeration of hcov 229e viral stocks using tcid50 technique","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of an unvalidated test method","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential cross-contamination during testing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate follow-up period after coating application","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
